title: Love Island's Belle Hassan steps out after sparking Anton reconciliation rumours
text:
She has sparked speculation she's back with her Love Island beau Anton Danyluk after the pair reunited for a night out.

And Belle Hassan was putting on a stylish display when she stepped out solo on Saturday night, partying at Pure Nightclub in Bexleyheath.

The 21-year-old star exuded confidence in a low-cut black minidress for her night on the town, strutting her stuff in the skimpy little number.

Glamorous: Belle Hassan was putting on a stylish display when she stepped out solo on Saturday night, partying at Pure Nightclub in Bexleyheath

Belle put her long legs on display in the thigh-skimming number, which she accessorised with a pair of strappy heels.

The blonde beauty added a statement red jewel necklace to complete her look and wore her blonde extensions down loose.

The stunning star flashed a coy smile as she headed out without Scottish gym owner Anton.

Stepping out: The 21-year-old star exuded confidence in a low-cut black minidress for her night on the town, strutting her stuff in the skimpy little number

Turning heads: The blonde beauty added a statement red jewel necklace to complete her look and wore her blonde extensions down loose

Belle's outing comes after she reunited with ex Anton on a night out with Anna Vakili, sparking speculation that they are back together.

The couple first struck up a romance while they were taking part in the reality series but split up just weeks after they left the villa.

But the pair looked cosy as they posed for a snap at Beiruit Nights in London alongside Anna.

Reunion: Belle and Anton have reunited on a night out with Anna Vakili, sparking speculation that they are back together

Anton wrote alongside the photo: 'Catch up with these two ❤️' while Anna commented underneath, writing: 'Love you guysssss'.

Several fans commented on the post, wondering if the couple had decided to get back together.

One user wrote: 'Are you back with Belle mate?' while another said: 'Hmmm ya'll are back together'.

Anton sported a black jacket and matching shirt in the snap while Belle cut a stylish in a dark grey printed jumper dress.

Relationship: The couple first struck up a romance while they were taking part in the reality series but split up just weeks after they left the villa (pictured in July 2019)

Reaction: Several fans commented on the post, wondering if the couple had decided to get back together

Following their split, Belle told The Sun Online that she and Anton 'still have chemistry' and added that she believes in second chances.

It comes after Anton and Belle recently enjoyed a double date with fellow islanders Lucie Donlan and Joe Garratt.

During the boozy night out, Lucie filmed a video of Anton lifting his shirt up and Belle licking his abs before she took a lime from his mouth.

Joe could be heard saying 'they're just friends!' as Lucie could be heard laughing in the background while filming the moment.

After Belle had taken the lime from his mouth, Anton repeated: 'just friends!' as the group all laughed.

It was reported that Anton and Belle called it quits just five weeks in the villa, despite vowing to stay together after narrowly missing out on a place in the final.

Future: Following their split, Belle told The Sun Online that she and Anton 'still have chemistry' and added that she believes in second chances (pictured in July 2019)

This made them the second couple from the 2019 series to part ways, following on from Chris Taylor and Harley Brash, who broke up last month.

Belle and Anton had already sparked split rumours when she posted a cryptic quote whilst he partied in Ibiza, and it seemed she had enough after watching him on his lads' holiday.

A source told The Sun: 'Belle has seen all the pictures and videos of Anton in Ibiza and now just wants out. She feels he's disrespecting their relationship and can't see him changing his ways.

'His obsession with Craig David also made her feel awkward. He seemed to be more excited about reuniting with Craig than speaking to her.'

MailOnline contacted Belle and Anton's representatives for comment at the time.

Night on the town: It comes after Anton and Belle sparked rumours their romance is back on after a steamy video of Belle licking his abs

Raunchy: The pair, who got together on this year's series of Love Island, enjoyed a double date with fellow islanders Lucie Donlan and Joe Garratt

Flirty: During the boozy night out, Lucie filmed a video of Anton lifting his shirt up and Belle licking his abs before she took a lime from his mouth

The reports came after Belle took to Instagram to post a cryptic and defiant post which read: 'Know your worth. Know the difference between what you're getting and what you deserve.'

Anton and Belle's relationship status had been under scrutiny for a while, with the hunk telling new! magazine: 'Everyone's saying this 'making it official' as if we've been in a relationship for so long.

'I'm very much a realist. We've still got a bit of dating to do on the outside before we know if it's going to work. But we're both on the same page, which is important.'
